init_eqs_str: a['basstime'] = 0; a['stickybit'] = 0; a['bass_clip'] = 0; a['volavg2'] = 0; a['q1'] = 0; a['sample1'] = 0; a['diff'] = 0; a['edge'] = 0; a['volavg'] = 0; a['time2'] = 0; a['bit2'] = 0; a['vol'] = 0; a['q2'] = 0; a['q3'] = 0; a['basssum'] = 0; a['sample2'] = 0;
frame_eqs_str: a['basstime']=(a['basstime']+(a['bass_att']*0.03)); a['vol']=pow(((a['bass']+a['mid'])+a['treb']), 2); a['basssum']=a['vol']; a['stickybit']=mod(a['time'],2); a['volavg']=(a['volavg']+(a['vol']*equal(a['stickybit'], 1))); a['sample1']=(a['sample1']+equal(a['stickybit'], 1)); a['volavg2']=(a['volavg2']+(a['vol']*equal(a['stickybit'], 0))); a['sample2']=(a['sample2']+equal(a['stickybit'], 0)); a['edge']=bnot(equal(a['bit2'], a['stickybit'])); a['volavg']=(a['volavg']-((a['volavg']*a['edge'])*a['stickybit'])); a['volavg2']=(a['volavg2']-((a['volavg2']*a['edge'])*equal(a['stickybit'], 0))); a['sample1']=(a['sample1']-((a['sample1']*a['edge'])*a['stickybit'])); a['sample2']=(a['sample2']-((a['sample2']*a['edge'])*equal(a['stickybit'], 0))); a['diff']=((Math.abs(equal(a['stickybit'], 1))>0.00001)?(div(a['basssum'],div(a['volavg2'],a['sample2']))):(0)); a['diff']=((Math.abs(equal(a['stickybit'], 0))>0.00001)?(div(a['basssum'],div(a['volavg'],a['sample1']))):(a['diff'])); a['diff']=a['diff']; a['monitor']=a['diff']; a['bit2']=mod(a['time'],2); a['q1']=a['diff']; a['basstime']=(a['basstime']+(a['bass_att']*0.09)); a['time2']=(a['time2']+(a['bass_att']*0.01)); a['q2']=(a['time2']+(equal(a['bass_clip'], 2)*0.4)); a['q3']=a['basstime'];
